    #include <stdio.h>
    int main()
    {
    int number = 0, remainder = 0;
    while(number!=-1)
    {
    scanf("%d",&number);
    if(number!=-1)
    {
    remainder = number%2;
    if(remainder==1)
    printf("%d is an odd number.\n", number);
    else	
    printf("%d is an even number.\n", number);
    number=-1;
    }
    }
    return 0;
    }
